hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; case "$FILE" in *.py) ruff format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true ;; *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json) npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true ;; *.go) gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true ;; *.rs) rustfmt "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true ;; esac'
